name: Devenv
help: Devenv lets you build projects and deploy projects from the command line. Use these switches to run the IDE from a script or a .bat file (such as a nightly build script).

tasks.help: Devenv lets you build projects and deploy projects from the command line. Use these switches to run the IDE from a script or a .bat file (such as a nightly build script).

commonTaskProperties.name: Build
commonTaskProperties.help: Builds the specified solution or project according to the configuration of the specified solution.

commonTaskProperties.name: Rebuild
commonTaskProperties.help: Cleans and then builds the specified solution or project according to the configuration of the specified solution.

commonTaskProperties.name: Deploy
commonTaskProperties.help: Builds the solution, along with files necessary for deployment, according to the solution's configuration.

commonTaskProperties.name: Clean
commonTaskProperties.help: Deletes any files created by the build command, without affecting source files.

commonTaskProperties.name: Logfile
commonTaskProperties.help: Lets you specify a file to receive errors when you build.

commonTaskProperties.name: Project
commonTaskProperties.help: The project to build, clean, or deploy.

commonTaskProperties.name: ProjectConfig
commonTaskProperties.help: Specifies the project configuration to build or deploy.
